attributes.action: Investigate why, and prevent Local Authorities sacking Chief Executives  and Directors just because their "face no longer fits"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It seems that many Chief executives of Local Authorities in England and Wales are being asked to resign just because there is a "clash of Personality"  with the Leader of the Council or with an influential member or clique on the council Cabinet.
Sometimes there may be a "conspiracy"   by elected members  to get rid of a CEO  or  a Director.
Please ask the Audit Commission to investigate the size of the "Golden Goodbye payments"   Please prevent these deals being made secret.
